result.translation: Indeed, We sent this [Qur’an] down on the Night of Decree[1].
result.footnotes: [1] The Qur’an was first revealed completely to the lowest heaven on this night. Also, its revelation on the Prophet (ﷺ) started on this night.

result.translation: How do you know what the Night of Decree is?

result.arabic_text: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
result.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

result.arabic_text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
result.translation: On that night the angels and the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] descend by their Lord’s permission with all decrees[2].
result.footnotes: [2] Bringing down the exact provisions, life, death, and other things destined for the creatures for the coming year by Allah's permission.

result.translation: It is all peace[3] until the break of dawn.
